Text: EMCA Attempted Break In on MorganI have to admit this is the first email I have sent to the group but do find it necessary to be educated and sometimes enjoy reading about what is going on in the neighborhood around us I felt it my duty to alert the association about an ATTEMPTED break in that occurred at our home We have an attached storage room in the back of our home with a separate entrance It has old paint some wood a cat carrier and a few items of NO value It seems a few night ago someone armed with a cordless drill and obviously nothing better to do tried to no avail to drill all the way through the door and break the lock to get what was inside Fortunately our lock and the door are stronger and they did not get in but we did not hear them either We have filed a police report and tried to block access to the rear of our house however it still steams us We are now more aware of our home as well as the neighborhood Hope this helps Hank Jennifer Morgan Do You Yahoo Try FREE Yahoo Mail the worlds greatest free email Yahoo Groups Sponsor Buy Stock for No Minimums FREE Money BgmYkBVovDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms
